title: [Large-Scale] Digital Gamification-Based EFL Learner English Writing Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English writing proficiency and experience in administrative/leadership roles
context.additional_context: Gamified learning environment implementation using VR simulations in smartphone-centric limited-technology settings

learning_goals: Learners can enhance the completion rate of English writing tasks by 20% using gamification elements.
Learners can increase English writing motivation by 15% through digital game elements based on competition and collaboration.
Learners can reduce English sentence structure errors by 30% based on immediate feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
